channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Carabao Cup
channel.desc: Mark Pougatch presents 2025-26 EFL Carabao Cup Fourth Round coverage as Championship side Wrexham play host to League One Cardiff City in an all-Welsh tie at the Racecourse Ground.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.[(96057)]
